import DLC from"./DLC";export default(function(measuredDepthCurrent,inclinationCurrent,azimuthCurrent){var measuredDepthPrior=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:1;var inclinationPrior=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:2;var azimuthPrior=arguments.length>5&&arguments[5]!==undefined?arguments[5]:3;var converter=Math.PI/180;// calculate DLC
var calculatedDLC=DLC(inclinationPrior,inclinationCurrent,azimuthPrior,azimuthCurrent);var calculatedDLS=calculatedDLC/converter*100/(measuredDepthCurrent-measuredDepthPrior);return parseFloat(calculatedDLS.toFixed(2));});
